flawed_nl_solution:
Jack had 13 more than 8 notebooks for a total of 13+8 = <<13+8=12>>12 notebooks
He gave 5 notebooks to Paula so he has 12-5 = <<12-5=7>>7 notebooks left
He gave another 6 to Mike so he has 7-6 = <<7-6=1>>1 notebooks left
#### 1

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 12. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
